about_the_game:
We used to be enemies. We used to destroy the world around us. Now, we create!

The Castle Crashers Painter Boss Paradise DLC is coming soon to Steam!

The DLC will include:

  • Steam workshop capabilities – create your own knight skins, choose your magic, and share with the world!

  • New official character: play as Paint Junior, use your imagination, and unleash powerful art to vanquish your foes!

  • New player and weapon artwork for all official playable characters (with an option to toggle on or off).

  • Endless knightly possibilities – if you aren’t feeling creative, choose from thousands of community characters or preloaded characters created by our team!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® 7 and 10
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz+ or better
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:256 MB video card
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:255 MB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible
  • Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional:Supports Direct Input compatible controllers
  • Additional:Ultra Graphics Mode requires a 64-bit OS, at least 4GB of RAM, and a 2GB VRAM.

short_description: The Painter Boss Paradise DLC provides a fresh coat of paint to Castle Crashers with new main menu art and redraws for all playable characters and weapons! Join Paint Junior, the game’s newest official character, and bring your custom characters to life with the Steam Workshop!
supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian
*languages with full audio support
